IAS Salary 2025

Complete salary structure for Indian Administrative Service officers including pay scale, allowances, perks and career progression details

IAS Salary Quick Facts

₹56,100
Starting Basic Pay
₹2,25,000
Maximum Basic Pay
₹1,10,000+
Average In-hand
30+ Years
Service Period

IAS Salary Breakdown (Entry Level)

Component Amount (₹) Percentage Description
Basic Pay 56,100 - As per 7th Pay Commission
Dearness Allowance (DA) 28,050 50% Based on current DA rate
House Rent Allowance (HRA) 13,464 24% For X class cities
Transport Allowance 3,200 - For official transport
Medical Allowance 1,000 - Medical expenses
Gross Salary 1,01,814 - Before deductions
Provident Fund 6,732 12% Of basic pay
Professional Tax 200 - State dependent
Income Tax 8,000 - Approximate
Net In-hand Salary 86,882 - Take home amount

IAS Career Progression & Salary

Sub Divisional Magistrate

₹86,000 - ₹1,10,000
0-4 years experience

Entry level position with basic administrative responsibilities

Assistant Collector

₹1,10,000 - ₹1,40,000
4-8 years experience

Revenue collection and district administration duties

District Collector

₹1,40,000 - ₹1,80,000
8-15 years experience

Head of district administration with executive powers

Joint Secretary

₹1,80,000 - ₹2,20,000
15-20 years experience

Central government policy making positions

Additional Secretary

₹2,20,000 - ₹2,50,000
20-25 years experience

Senior policy positions in central ministries

Secretary

₹2,50,000+
25+ years experience

Highest administrative position in government
